title: You might want to disable amumu till this is fixed
body:
pretty much, you can have his w all the time 


link : http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2yy4g1/major_bug_if_amumu_has_w_activated_and_he_goes/

replies.body: this is the same bug with corki and his Gatling gun lasting forever, it seems to be a bug with some toggled abilities

> [{quoted}](name=Matutinus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xy14IIjI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-14T02:53:07.728+0000)
>
> this is the same bug with corki and his Gatling gun lasting forever, it seems to be a bug with some toggled abilities

corki e isn't a toggled ability though.
Nobody even plays Amumu, so they can just leave him playable while they fix it :^)
